Description: Located in the heart of Germantown, MD, our pet-friendly apartments offer the kind of lifestyle you deserve. Our spacious one and two bedroom apartments offer features like large walk-in closets, stacked washers & dryers, and a fully-equipped kitchen. It is easy to love our community. Residents of the best Germantown, MD apartments look forward to spending their free time in our refreshing community swimming pool, at our fitness center, or tennis court. Children of our Germantown apartment community enjoy our playground and space to play with their pets. Living in Germantown is a luxury in itself. The area is close enough to Washington, D.C. to enjoy what the city has to offer, but still provides a serene small town feel. With the best school districts in the state and the best shopping just moments away from home, Northlake Apartments are perfectly located.

Description: The Adler at Waters Landing is one of Montgomery County's most popular apartment communities. Fully appointed apartments include expansive walk-in closets, washer and dryer, gas heat and hot water, and wall to wall carpeting. In addition, residents can choose from optional features including patio or balcony, sunroom, loft or fireplace.*For rest and relaxation, residents have the use of both the lap pool and swimming pool, fully equipped fitness center and on-site racquetball court. The nearby Black Hills Regional Park and Waters Landing Community Association Amenities complete the recreational offerings.*Grocery and retail shopping as well as fine dining are all within one mile. Sugarloaf Center, Germantown Commons and the new Town Center of Germantown are also nearby. Additionally, residents enjoy the easy proximity of I-270, Rockville and Frederick.*So, congratulations! Your search for the perfect apartment is over. Welcome Home to the Adler at Waters Landing...

Description: The Elms at Germantown has some of the most spacious one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes in all of Germantown. The community also offers one of the best locations in the area for great shopping, dining, and entertainment. If you are craving sushi, look no further than the fabulous menu at Yuraku. For when only pizza and other Italian fare will hit the spot Agrodolce is just around the corner. Eat in or carry out some of the delicious Chinese food from Old Shanghai Cafe. Mi Rancho features a fantastic Tex-Mex menu, or you could always try something new at India Palace or Caspian Kabob, both less than a mile away. After your meal you can catch the newest movie at Regal Germantown Stadium 14. If you prefer something live, you can find performances and galleries at BlackRock Center for the Arts. Description: Stonecreek Club Apartment Homes in Germantown, Maryland, offers pet friendly, smoke free living on 17 sprawling acres. Our apartments include a private patio or balcony, washer and dryer, accent walls, walk in closets and window coverings, plus optional features such as a fireplace, bay window or den. Our community boasts a dog park, 24 hour fitness center, swimming pool, playground, picnic area, car wash station, on site recycling, and community clubhouse. We are close to I 270, Route 118 and public transportation, just 15 minutes to Rockville, 45 minutes to Washington DC and an hour to Baltimore. Nearby, you will find shopping, restaurants and many parks. Guarantors welcome!

Description: Seneca Club in Germantown, MD on Great Seneca Highway offers spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need and are very close to transit options – Ride-On bus 74 stops here with service to Shady Grove Metro station. Only 5 minutes to I-270 and MARC Germantown station. Very close to grocery stores, endless shopping, restaurants and services. 5 minutes to South Germantown Park & Discovery Sports Center/Soccerplex, Seneca Creek State Park, and Black Rock Center for the Arts and Regal Cinemas. Apartment features include a comfortable living area and dining area, optional extra-large living area, fully equipped galley-style kitchen, laundry room with full-size washer & dryer, large windows in each room (we provide blinds throughout), nice views of green courtyards or mature forest, and central heat & air conditioning. Utilities are not included in your rent – you pay electricity, and water/sewer. We are a pet-friendly community and we accept some dogs, all cats and some other types of pets. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, whirlpool spa, fitness center with cardio machines & weight stations, racquetball court, car wash area, play area, three picnic areas with grills, mail delivery in each building, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.senecaclubapartments.com.

Description: Alta Liberty Mill connects people to what they love. It's for those who seek a respite from the city, but still desire to be part of a vibrant and social community that's close to all the action. It offers a sophisticated, socially energized and uniquely connected lifestyle. Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes boast luxury stainless steel appliances and upscale finishes that welcome you home. Outdoor spaces cater to a fun and active lifestyle, with a pool and surrounding sundeck, fire pit lounge, grilling areas, children's playground, dog park and more. Inside, you have access to our expansive clubhouse with culinary lounge with demonstration kitchen, business center and game room, a state-of-the-art fitness center with cardio studio, and a movie theater.From our spectacular amenities to our walkability to the Germantown MARC Station, Alta Liberty Mill offers our residents a luxurious and accessible residential experience unlike any other in Germantown.

Description: Add some elegance to your home life at The Hamptons at Town Center, a luxurious community of apartments for rent in Germantown, MD. Gorgeously landscaped grounds, spacious interiors, an amazing amenities package and a perfect location make this the ideal place to call home. You'll feel pampered every day as you lounge beside the sparkling swimming pool, engage in a friendly game on the tennis court or just relax with your neighbors in the beautifully designed resident clubhouse. Plus, your stunning one or two bedroom apartment will feature modern kitchens, private patios and an abundance of closet space. Conveniently located near the I-270 freeway and just a short drive away from Washington D.C. and Baltimore, your daily commute will be easier than ever. A vast array of nearby retail and grocery stores will make running errands a breeze. Life is always relaxing and convenient at Hamptons at Town Center Apartments in Germantown, MD.

Description: Covenant village is the newest affordable retirement community, located in the heart of Germantown, designed to suit the needs of active, independent seniors at least 62 years of age. This Charming rental community offers you a home close to family and is an ideal option in affordable senior living. Covenant Village offers opportunities to meet new friends, share new adventures and stay active. Covenant Village offers more than exceptional apartment Homes. Our relaxing, inviting community spaces are also perfect for socializing with family and friends. In so many ways Covenant Village is a surprising alternative in retirement living offering all the benefits of convenient, affordable and carefree living. It is the premier senior rental community designed to fit your lifestyle. Welcome home!

The community is conveniently located close to restaurants shopping and I 270.This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo has vaulted ceilings skylights a fireplace and has been freshly painted updated baths rooms new carpet and a new kitchen. Description:
(240) 803-2255 - A Sparkling Jewel at Waters Row in Germantown! - Beautifully renovated townhouse with 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath and one car garage attached. Updated kitchen with granite counter top, brand new SS appliances, spacious deck off kitchen. Fresh paint, new carpet and hardwood flooring. Seasonal sunlight fill-in Living Room thru front view large windows. Ceiling fan/light in each bedroom, vaulted ceiling &sky window upper level. Finished basement with walk out entrance, one large open room for multiple purpose use. Cul-de-sac with more parking spaces. Near entrance of I-270 and shopping center. 
Ready for move-in after 10/15, please call 240-803-2255 or 202-751-9455 to schedule your showing appointment.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3596099) Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

(240) 421-8701 - Spacious 2 bedroom 2 Full bath Condo. - Property Id: 38019
Spacious 2 bedroom 2 full bath Condo backing to woods. Very private. Fully renovated with fresh paint, New carpet, New Kitchen appliances,new kitchen flooring. New Bathroom vanities and New bathroom flooring. Private parking Space. Full size washer and dryer in the unit. Off site Swimming pool and Fitness room. walking distance from shopping centers and Great Seneca Creek Elementary School and North West High school.
Ride on bus and Metro accessible. 15 minutes from I- 270 Very convenient location.
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/13211-chalet-pl

No Dogs Allowed

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Updated 3BR/2.5BA End of Row Townhouse in Germantown - Great Commute to DC! - Updated 3 bedroom and 2 and one half bath townhouse in Germantown with great commute to DC! First floor features gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout a sunken living room, separate dining room, ½ bath and fully updated kitchen with tiled floors, custom tiled backsplash, granite countertops and breakfast island. 2nd floor has a fully updated hall bath with tiled floors, tiled tub enclosure and updated fixtures as well as 3 spacious bedrooms. Master bedroom includes his/her closets and a fully updated master bath with tiled floors, custom tiled walk in shower and updated fixtures. Enjoy a fully finished basement clubroom with wood burning stove and a separate laundry/storage room. There is a spacious deck, patio and fenced in backyard great for entertaining with detached storage shed for tenant use. The neighborhood has many great features, including a walking trail within steps of the house that takes you to Lake Churchill (5 minute walk). Tenants have free access to two community pools, a park, playground and within walking distance from the elementary school!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with an additional pet deposit.
Contact Sophia at (443-758-1005 for details or to schedule an appointment or email scolon@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3569952) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - Great 2 BR/2FB home. Great location - Lovely home in quiet Germantown community.
Main floor has large living room nice kitchen with breakfast bar, and dining area. This floor exits to an enclosed patio with ample room for great summer barbecues. Upstairs you will find a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and what used to be 2 small bedrooms converted to a large bedroom with its own full bathroom as well.
Kitchen has all newer appliances. Great HW floors in main floor. Come take a look!
(RLNE3554589)

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Newly Renovated 2BR/2BA Top Floor Condo in Germantown, MD - Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom 2 Full Bathroom Top Floor Condominium in Germantown, MD. Features rich hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room with DECORATIVE gas fireplace. Newly renovated eat in kitchen features tiled floors, granite countertops, granite breakfast bar, custom cabinets with plenty of storage space, and all appliances including dishwasher and 4 burner gas stove. Separate dining room has beautiful crown molding, laundry/storage area with washer/dryer included, and a spacious hall bath with tiled walk in shower, tiled floors, and updated fixtures. There are also 2 spacious bedrooms both with walk in closets including a master bedroom with a full master bath with tiled floors, tiled soaker tub and updated fixtures. Other amenities include a spacious balcony for entertaining, updated energy efficient windows, updated light fixtures/ceiling fans throughout. The condo is located in a beautiful quiet community with access to the community pool, gym, and clubhouse which can be rented out (ALL INCLUDED IN THE RENT)!
Pets under 20lbs considered on a case by case basis with an additional Pet Deposit!!
Contact Sophia at (443) 758-1005 for details or to schedule an appointment or email scolon@baymgmtgroup.com 
Here is the link to apply online: 
https://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/ 
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3493786) Other Amenities - Other- hardwood floors, decorative fireplace, custom tiled floors, granite countertops, breakfast bar, ceiling fans, clubhouse, Pool, Exercise Facility, Balcony. Appliances - Dishwasher, Range, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Gorgeous Updated 2BR/1.5BA End of Row TH in Germantown, MD - Gorgeous Updated 2 Bedroom 1 Full and 1/2 Bathroom End of Row Townhome in Germantown, MD. Conveniently located to Rt. 200 (ICC), I270, I370, great schools, hospitals and many great shops/restaurants. Features first floor has rich hardwood floors, an updated ½ bath with new fixtures and a spacious living room/dining room combo with great open floor plan! The first floor also features a beautiful eat in kitchen with granite countertops, granite tile flooring, plenty of cabinet space and all brand new appliances including dishwasher. The 2nd floor has 2 spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space, a laundry area with washer/dryer included and an updated full bath with custom tiled floor, custom tiled walk in shower enclosure and new fixtures. The house has central air, updated light fixtures/ceiling fans and a spacious fenced in back yard with deck for entertaining!
Pets under 15lbs considered on a case by case basis with additional Pet Deposit!!

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/e330fcb084 ----
Come check out this spacious 3b/2.5ba town home with an attached 1-car garage. First time ever rented! Gorgeous hardwood floors in kitchen & dining area, high-end stainless steel appliances including convection oven and super-capacity French door refrigerator, upgraded pantry, vaulted ceilings on main level, plush carpet in living room & bedrooms, large walk-in closet in master, and en-suite master bath with double sink vanity. Ground floor includes newly renovated rec room with custom built-in bookcase, high-end washer & dryer, and large storage closet with custom shelves. Great location close to I-270, transportation, shopping, & restaurants. 
Assigned Parking
Garage
Off Street Parking

Description:
Top Floor Luxury Townhome In Spotless Condition For RENT. 3BR/2.5BA Features a Modern Open Spacious Floor Plan, Gourmet Kitchen W/Granite Countertops, Breakfast Bar. LR W/Vaulted 9' Ceilings and Palladian Windows, Boosting Plenty of Natural Light, Large Deck Off Dining Area. W/D in- unit. Upper Level Includes an Elegant Master Suite with Walk in Closet, And Two Additional Large Bedrooms. One Car Attached Garage Additional Reserved Space at Front Door.
Community Features Green Space, A Club Center Complete W/ Outdoor Pool, Gym, Tot Lot, A Well-Appointed Party Room with Separate Meeting Room. Buckingham Station Condo Perfectly Located in Germantown. Very Close to Train Station, Germantown Soccerplex, Route 270, Restaurants, Black Hills Regional Park.

Walking distance to shopping, bus stop & 355. Less than 5 minutes to I270. DON'T MISS IT!

Description:
Seneca Ridge offers well-appointed three and four bedroom townhomes with open design and modern conveniences to meet your every need in Germantown. Washer and dryer in every home, new stainless steel Energy Star appliances, open and spacious floorplans, luxurious bathrooms with designer ceramic tile, brushed nickel accents, and rich-toned hardwood floors create a sense of home - the perfect home for you.
Walking distance to Middlebrook Square, grocery, shopping, restaurants, and entertainment are all nearby. Across the street is the Plumgar Park Community Center which offers a playground, indoor sports courts, billiards, and events. Right off of 355/Frederick Road and minutes to 270, Seneca Ridge is close to everything, including perfection.

Description: In the heart of beautiful Germantown, The Acclaim puts you right in the middle of one of Montgomery County's most popular communities. Surrounded by shopping, dining and outdoor recreation, Germantown offers you everything you want close to home.Find great shopping and dining at the nearby Germantown Town Center and Lakeforest Mall, hop on I-270 and easily get to downtown Washington or catch a bus on site to the Shady Grove Metro.

Description:
(240) 994-3876 - Galway Bay Cir - Sun-filled, open concept condo w/2 master suites on the top floor. Spacious LR, open kitchen, private balcony off LR with wooded view, 2 large walk-in closets. Newly renovated baths, painted in natural color. Washer and dryer in unit. Amenities: pool, exercise room, party room. Pets are case-by-case/fee. Reserved parking space/ guests. Close to I-270, MARC train station, shopping.
(RLNE3393019) Other Amenities - Other- party room, Pool, Exercise Facility. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - Gorgeous 3 level townhouse by the lake! 2 master suites. - Gorgeous 3 level townhouse by the lake! 2 master suites. Back to a lake.
Main floor of this wonderful home has a nice living area and kitchen with room for a table. Go upstairs to find 2 master bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom. The fully finished walk-out basement has a full bathroom and closet as well as a privacy door so it can be used as a 3rd bedroom. This level also has a nice fireplace and exits to the back patio with deck. 
All new carpets and paint. Ready to move in!
(RLNE3394054) Other Amenities - Other- storage, en-suite bathrooms, new carpets, new paint, quiet community, fireplace, full bathroom in basement, Basement, Patio. Appliances - Refrigerator, Range, Washer & Dryer.

Pet Policy: Other Pets Allowed

* Dishwasher

Description: Enjoy the Good Life! Churchill Senior Living is an independent senior living community that offers affordable one and two bedroom apartments for independent individuals, age 62 and over. Since 2001 we have worked hard to establish ourselves as the trusted name in Senior Living in Germantown, Maryland. At Churchill we are proud to have had the privilege to work for and care for people age 62 and over longer than any other community in Germantown. Our residents enjoy an array of active social events as well as state of the art amenities
